def get_body_field(*, dependant, name: str):
    flat_dependant = get_flat_dependant(dependant)
    if not flat_dependant.body_params:
        return None
    model_name = "Body_" + name
    fields = {}
    for f in flat_dependant.body_params:
        fields[f.name] = (get_schema_compatible_field(field=f), ...)
    required = any(True for f in flat_dependant.body_params if f.required)
    
    BodyModel = create_model(model_name, **fields)

    if any(isinstance(f.schema, params.File) for f in flat_dependant.body_params):
        BodySchema = params.File
    elif any(isinstance(f.schema, params.Form) for f in flat_dependant.body_params):
        BodySchema = params.Form
    else:
        BodySchema = params.Body

    field = Field(
        name="body",
        type_=BodyModel,
        default=None,
        required=required,
        model_config=BaseConfig,
        class_validators={},
        alias="body",
        schema=BodySchema(None),
    )
    return field
imports: from pydantic import BaseModel, create_model, Field
